why would you burn subtitles you jerkoff?

Every single "Swesub" torrent I've ever seen has the Swedish subtitles burned in.  For the life of me I fail to understand why they don't put them in a separate track so the entire rest of the world can enjoy the movie too, without having to watch subtitles in a language that only about .1% of the world's population speaks.  What a waste.
